name: Player vs Silly Billy - Poppy Playtime - [Actual Mod]
name_original: Player vs Silly Billy - Poppy Playtime - [Actual Mod]
description:
DO NOT CREATE VIDEOS WITH THIS MOD'S SPRITES AND SOUNDS UNTIL JANUARY 31st. VIEWS ON THIS SHOWCASE IS THE ONLY WAY FOR ME TO GET ANY PROFIT FROM MY MOD

So here's an UPDATE, I added a lot of new things.

The thing is that you need to change characters in 7 key menu:

Killy Willy - hug

Player - player

Poppy over GF behind BoomBox - pop

Silly Billy before burning - wug

Poppy over GF on BoomBox -popl

Doll Player - playerd

Silly Billy prototype - sb

Player over GF - popp

Poppy over BF - playerpop

Gametoons Huggy Wuggy - hw

Gametoons Kissy Missy - km

Also it have a unique UI sprites and it crush my pc.

I port it to modding plus cuz I can't work with psycho engine at all. This mod is based on cartoon animation "LEGEND of KILLY WILLY... (Poppy Playtime Animation)" by Gametoons and also inspired by this mod https://gamebanana.com/mods/342042  and this one https://gamebanana.com/mods/342214. It's technically part of MAIN mod https://gamebanana.com/mods/285137. For covers I used FL Studio for Killy Willy and UTAU for Player. By the way, noises that Killy Willy made in his episode was not been good for cover so I used voice of Hypno from GT episode so technically Killy Willy is Hypno. 

Fla and Samples are available.

Alternative link: https://gamebanana.com/mods/344273
